conf.label: Enemy Level:
conf.tooltip:
This overrides the default enemy level used to estimate your hit and evade chances.
The default level is your character level, capped at 84, which is the same value
used in-game to calculate the stats on the character sheet.

conf.label: Enemy Physical Hit Damage:
conf.tooltip:
This overrides the default damage amount used to estimate your physical damage reduction from armour.
The default is 1.5 times the enemy's base damage, which is the same value
used in-game to calculate the estimate shown on the character sheet.

conf.label: Are you always on Full Life?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to be on Full Life if you have Chaos Innoculation,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Are you always on Low Life?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to be on Low Life if you have at least 65% life reserved,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Are you always on Full Energy Shield?
Do you always have Energy Shield?
Are your minions always on Full Life?
Ignite calculation mode:
conf.tooltip:
Controls how the base damage for ignite is calculated:
Average Damage: Ignite is based on the average damage dealt, factoring in crits and non-crits.
Crit Damage: Ignite is based on crit damage only.

conf.label: Travel distance:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the travel distance used to calculate the distance damage bonus.
The maximum distance is 60 units.

conf.label: Skeleton Life:
conf.tooltip: Sets the maximum life of the skeleton that is being targeted.

conf.label: Spectre Level:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the level of the raised spectre.
The default level is the level requirement of the Raise Spectre skill.

conf.label: Enable curses:
conf.tooltip: Enable any curse skills that your spectres have.

conf.label: Blade Vortex blade count:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the blade count for Blade Vortex skills used by spectres.
Default is 1; maximum is 5.

conf.label: Enemy Physical Damage reduction:
conf.tooltip: 'Armoured'

conf.label: Enemy is Hexproof?
conf.tooltip: 'Hexproof'

conf.label: Less effect of Curses on Enemy:
conf.tooltip: 'Hexwarded'

conf.label: Enemy avoid Poison/Blind/Bleed:
conf.tooltip: 'Impervious'

conf.label: Enemy has Elemental/Chaos Resist:
conf.tooltip: 'Resistant'

conf.label: Player has Elemental Equilibrium?
conf.tooltip: 'of Balance'

conf.label: Cannot Leech Life/Mana?
conf.tooltip: 'of Congealment'

conf.label: Gains reduced Flask Charges:
conf.tooltip: 'of Drought'

conf.label: -X% maximum Resistances:
conf.tooltip:
'of Exposure'
Mid tier: 5-8%
High tier: 9-12%

conf.label: Less Area of Effect:
conf.tooltip: 'of Impotence'

conf.label: Enemy avoid Elem. Status Ailments:
conf.tooltip: 'of Insulation'

conf.label: Unlucky Dodge/Enemy has inc. Accuracy:
conf.tooltip: 'of Miring'

conf.label: Reduced Block Chance/less Armour:
conf.tooltip: 'of Rust'

conf.label: Player has Point Blank?
conf.tooltip: 'of Skirmishing'

conf.label: Less Recovery of Life and Energy Shield:
conf.tooltip: 'of Smothering'

conf.label: Cannot Regen Life, Mana or ES?
conf.tooltip: 'of Stasis'

conf.label: Enemy takes red. Extra Crit Damage:
conf.tooltip:
'of Toughness'
Low tier: 25-30%
Mid tier: 31-35%
High tier: 36-40%

conf.label: Assassin's Mark:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Assassin's Mark to apply to the player.

conf.label: Conductivity:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Conductivity to apply to the player.

conf.label: Elemental Weakness:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the level of Elemental Weakness to apply to the player.
In mid tier maps, 'of Elemental Weakness' applies level 10.
In high tier maps, 'of Elemental Weakness' applies level 15.

conf.label: Enfeeble:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the level of Enfeeble to apply to the player.
In mid tier maps, 'of Enfeeblement' applies level 10.
In high tier maps, 'of Enfeeblement' applies level 15.

conf.label: Flammability:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Flammability to apply to the player.

conf.label: Frostbite:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Frostbite to apply to the player.

conf.label: Poacher's Mark:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Poacher's Mark to apply to the player.

conf.label: Projectile Weakness:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Projectile Weakness to apply to the player.

conf.label: Punishment:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Punishment to apply to the player.

conf.label: Temporal Chains:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the level of Temporal Chains to apply to the player.
In mid tier maps, 'of Temporal Chains' applies level 10.
In high tier maps, 'of Temporal Chains' applies level 15.

conf.label: Vulnerability:
conf.tooltip:
Sets the level of Vulnerability to apply to the player.
In mid tier maps, 'of Vulnerability' applies level 10.
In high tier maps, 'of Vulnerability' applies level 15.

conf.label: Warlord's Mark:
conf.tooltip: Sets the level of Warlord's Mark to apply to the player.

conf.label: Do your minions use Power Charges?
Do your minions use Frenzy Charges?
Do your minions use Endur. Charges?
Do you have Onslaught?
conf.tooltip:
In addition to allowing any 'while you have Onslaught' modifiers to apply,
this will enable the Onslaught buff itself. (20% increased Attack/Cast/Movement Speed)

conf.label: Do you have Unholy Might?
conf.tooltip: This will enable the Unholy Might buff. (Gain 30% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage)

conf.label: Do you have Tailwind?
conf.tooltip:
In addition to allowing any 'while you have Tailwind' modifiers to apply,
this will enable the Tailwind buff itself. (You are 10% faster)

conf.label: Do you have Adrenaline?
conf.tooltip:
This will enable the Adrenaline buff:
100% increased Damage
25% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed
10% additional Physical Damage Reduction

conf.label: Do you have a Flask active?
conf.tooltip:
This is automatically enabled if you have a flask active,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Do you have a Totem summoned?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to have a Totem if your main skill is a Totem,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Are you on Consecrated Ground?
conf.tooltip:
In addition to allowing any 'while on Consecrated Ground' modifiers to apply,
this will apply the 6% life regen modifier granted by Consecrated Ground.

conf.label: Is there only one nearby Enemy?
Have you Hit Recently?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to have Hit Recently if your main skill is self-cast,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Have you dealt a Non-Crit Recently?
Killed Enemy affected by your DoT Recently?
Have you Frozen an Enemy Recently?
Have you Ignited an Enemy Recently?
Have you Shocked an Enemy Recently?
Have you been Savage Hit Recently?
Have you been hit by Fire Recently?
Have you been hit by Cold Recently?
Have you been hit by Light. Recently?
Have you Blocked an Attack Recently?
Have you Blocked a Spell Recently?
Are you in Her Embrace?
conf.tooltip: This option is specific to Oni-Goroshi.

conf.label: Have you Attacked Recently?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to have Attacked Recently if your main skill is an attack,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Have you Cast a Spell Recently?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to have Cast a Spell Recently if your main skill is a spell,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Have you used a Skill Recently?
Have you used a Warcry Recently?
Have you used a Fire Skill Recently?
Have you used a Cold Skill Recently?
Have you used a Minion Skill Recently?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to have used a Minion skill Recently if your main skill is a minion skill,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Have you used a Movement Skill Recently?
conf.tooltip:
You will automatically be considered to have used a Movement skill Recently if your main skill is a movement skill,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 10s?
Have you used a Cold Skill in the past 10s?
Have you used a Light. Skill in the past 10s?
Blocked hit from a Unique Recently?
Blocked hit from a Unique in the past 10s?
Is the enemy on Full Life?
Is the enemy on Low Life?
Is the enemy at Close Range?
Is the enemy Cursed?
conf.tooltip:
Your enemy will automatically be considered to be Cursed if you have at least one curse enabled,
but you can use this option to force it if necessary.

conf.label: Is the enemy Blinded?
conf.tooltip:
In addition to allowing 'against Blinded Enemies' modifiers to apply,
this will lessen the enemy's chance to hit, and thereby increase your evade chance.

conf.label: Is the enemy Ignited?
conf.tooltip: This also implies that the enemy is Burning.

conf.label: Is the enemy Frozen?
conf.tooltip: This also implies that the enemy is Chilled.

conf.label: Is the enemy Shocked?
conf.tooltip:
In addition to allowing any 'against Shocked Enemies' modifiers to apply,
this will apply Shock's Damage Taken modifier to the enemy.

conf.label: Is the enemy Intimidated?
conf.tooltip:
This adds the following modifiers:
10% increased Damage Taken by enemy

conf.label: Is the enemy Intimidated?
conf.tooltip:
This adds the following modifiers:
10% increased Attack Damage Taken by enemy

conf.label: Is the enemy covered in Ash?
conf.tooltip:
This adds the following modifiers:
20% less enemy Movement Speed
20% increased Fire Damage Taken by enemy

conf.label: is the enemy Rare or Unique?
conf.tooltip: Your enemy will automatically be considered to be Unique if one of the Boss options is selected.

conf.label: Is the enemy a Boss?
conf.tooltip:
Standard Boss adds the following modifiers:
60% less Effect of your Curses
+30% to enemy Elemental Resistances
+15% to enemy Chaos Resistance

Shaper/Guardian adds the following modifiers:
80% less Effect of your Curses
+40% to enemy Elemental Resistances
+25% to enemy Chaos Resistance
50% less Duration of Bleed
50% less Duration of Poison
50% less Duration of Ignite

conf.label: Is the enemy a Boss?
conf.tooltip:
Standard Boss adds the following modifiers:
60% less Effect of your Curses
+30% to enemy Elemental Resistances
+15% to enemy Chaos Resistance

Shaper/Guardian adds the following modifiers:
80% less Effect of your Curses
+40% to enemy Elemental Resistances
+25% to enemy Chaos Resistance

conf.label: Enemy was Hit by Fire Damage?
Enemy was Hit by Cold Damage?
Enemy was Hit by Light. Damage?
Ignore Skill Hit Damage?
conf.tooltip: This option prevents EE from being reset by the hit damage of your main skill.
